analysis.Summary: Vue single‐file component that renders an SVG "send" icon with a customizable fill color.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable, stylable "send" icon for use in navigation or UI elements throughout the application.

Components.name: IconSend
responsibilities: Render an SVG path shaped like a "send" arrow.
Expose a `fill` prop to allow dynamic coloring of the icon.

Dependencies: vue (for defining the component and props API)
analysis.Usage:
Import in any Vue component or view:

```js
import IconSend from 'modules/icons/navigation/IconSend.vue';
```

Then use in the template:

```html
<IconSend fill="#ff0000"/>
```
Notes: The default `fill` prop value has a missing closing parenthesis: 'rgb(var(--black)'.
No accessibility attributes (e.g. `aria-label` or `<title>`) are provided on the SVG.
The component has fixed width/height (80×80) and viewBox; styling overrides require wrapping or direct CSS targeting.
No additional methods or lifecycle hooks — purely presentational.
